dmca.title: Virtual Pet Site Jerks Purina's Chain
dmca.body:
We represent Nestle Purina PetCare Company and its related company, Societe des Produits Nestle S.A., ("Purina") in trademark matters.

Purina owns U.S. Trademark Registration Nos. 0102843,0552944, 0611152, 0680078, 0781826,  845968, 0986551,1272052,1478226,1484494, 1705939, 1710836, 1943191,2488823, 2496857, 2615373 and 2671678, covering its family of CHOW trademarks, including the registered mark CHOW@. As a result of literally billions of dollars in sales and advertising over many decades, Purina's family of CHOW trademarks have become nationally famous and highly respected. Indeed, they are brand leaders in the field of pet food. By virtue of its longstanding use and registration of its CHOW mark, Purina enjoys the exclusive right to use CHOW, and all marks and designations confusingly similar thereto. 

Purina also enjoys the exclusive right to use checkerboard designs in connection with the sale of pet foods. During the past 100 years, checkerboards have been used as trademarks to identify Purina's animal food business. The company has used checkerboard marks on its pet food products since at least as early as 1926. Checkerboards are employed by Purina on pet food and pet treats throughout the United States and in many foreign countries. Such products bearing the company's famous checkerboard designs have over the years amounted to many billions of dollars in sales and advertising. The company
